tool_description: An API showing all the episodes of Tom & Jerry and the corresponding video.
name: Tom and Jerry
title: Tom and Jerry

api_list.name: Get All Tom & Jerry Episodes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Tom & Jerry episodes along with their corresponding video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tom-and-jerry.p.rapidapi.com/episodes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tom-and-jerry.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tom-and-jerry.p.rapidapi.com/episodes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tom-and-jerry.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
